info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 3:59AM CST until January 05 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...A wintry mix of wet snow, light sleet and/or light freezing rain expected. Total snow accumulations of a dusting up to one inch. Locally higher amounts, between two and three inches, are possible in the higher terrain of the Ouachitas and Ozarks. Some light icing may also be possible, mainly on bridges/overpasses. * WHERE...Portions of western, northern, and central Arkansas. Including the higher elevations of the Ozark, Boston, and Ouachita Mountains. * WHEN...Until noon CST today.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Be sure to check road conditions before traveling in these areas. Visit the Arkansas Department of Transportation`s website Idrivearkansas.com for the latest road and traffic conditions.
